title: Hertz Hands Keys to Ex-Goldman Sachs Executive After Wild Pandemic Ride
sub_head: Rental-car company taps Stephen Scherr to be its next CEO, succeeding interim chief Mark Fields
body:
Hertz Global Holdings Inc. on Friday named Stephen Scherr, a former Goldman Sachs Group Inc. executive, as its next chief executive officer.
Mr. Scherr, who retired as Goldmanâ€™s chief financial officer at the end of the year, succeeds Mark Fields, a former Ford Motor Co. chief who has been serving as interim CEO since October.
